one_liner.value: Private AI-powered family document management app that processes files entirely on-device

target_customer.value: Families and consumers managing personal documents (tax returns, estate plans, medical records, insurance policies)

notes: Consumer/B2C product, not B2B. Single-page website with only a Download button. On-device AI search for family documents. Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, TXT, PNG, JPEG. No pricing, no about page, no team info visible. Canvas-based rendering made text extraction difficult.

one_liner.value: GDPR-compliant AI conversation intelligence platform for sales teams that transcribes and analyzes meetings invisibly without bots or recordings

pricing.value: Three tiers: Standard (unlimited transcription, AI summaries), For Revenue Teams (adds CRM integration, AI coaching, analytics), Enterprise (SSO, custom AI models, priority support). No prices listed - Talk to a human for all plans.

target_customer.value: Customer-facing teams, sales teams, revenue teams, enterprises with GDPR compliance requirements

notes: German company with EU-hosted data. ISO27001 certified. Works on Windows, Mac, iOS. Integrates with Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack. Key differentiator: invisible in meetings (no bot), GDPR-compliant, works for both online and on-site meetings. Claims 8 hours saved per week. Webflow-based site.

one_liner.value: Cybersecurity vulnerability assessment and automated compliance management software for enterprises and government organizations

target_customer.value: US Department of Defense, military organizations, enterprises with IT compliance needs

press_releases.value: Has press releases section on website

notes: Federal SBA Certified Small Business. CAGE Code 80EX3, DUNS 080982289. NAICS codes include 519190, 541511-541519. Supports STIG, CIS, DISA compliance frameworks. Founded by Gilbert Bollinger (CEO, 22 years experience). Advisors include former US Congressman George Hochbrueckner and Akamai's Fran Trentley. Assesses devices in under 3 seconds. Provides interactive remediation and automated security controls.

one_liner.value: AI-powered store operations and supply chain management platform for forecasting, replenishment, and stock management that reduces food waste and increases profit

industry.value: Retail Tech / Supply Chain / Food Tech

headquarter_location.value: Derby, United Kingdom (49 Canal Street, Derby, DE1 2RJ)

target_customer.value: Global restaurant chains, convenience stores, distributors, manufacturers, head office and field managers

customer_count.value: 10,000s of users across 70+ countries, thousands of sites globally

notes: Certified B-Corporation. Registered in England and Wales No. 06725643. 99.9% platform uptime. $13Bn stock distribution value last 12 months. 18% average increase in profit, 16% decrease in food waste, 21% average site waste reduction. Key customers include Starbucks and EG. Founded by David Hall. CEO is Peter Evans, CTO Adam Smith. 17+ years in operation. 4 global hosting regions. 24/7 support.

one_liner.value: Enterprise cognition platform that unifies internal, external, and public data sources in real time for AI-powered analytics, decision-making, and workflow automation

target_customer.value: Enterprise companies looking to unify fragmented data across departments, break down silos, and automate workflows

notes: Early-stage enterprise AI company. 'Spots are limited - secure yours today' and 'Get Access' buttons suggest limited/early access. Founded by Kyle Csik (CEO, background in physics and math, worked with P&G and Mondelez) and Sasha (CTO, 20+ years experience, Singularity University graduate). Integrates with 100+ sources including Salesforce, Adobe Analytics, SAP, Oracle, NetSuite, Google Analytics, Snowflake. Claims 50% faster team workflows, 72% reduction in storage & ELT costs. RBAC security, data stays at REST. Blog posts date from Nov 2025 - Jan 2026.

one_liner.value: AI-powered all-in-one practice management software for UK accounting firms covering CRM, onboarding, AML, bookkeeping, accounts, tax, payroll unified in a single workflow engine

headquarter_location.value: London, United Kingdom (17 Bevis Marks, London, EC3A 7LN)

target_customer.value: UK accounting firms, bookkeepers, finance professionals

notes: UK-focused accounting practice management platform. Key metrics from customer case study (Caroola): +32% jobs completed per FTE, +14% gross margin, -41% rework, 100% SLA visibility. Caroola reduced headcount from 200 to 100 with 10% turnover increase. CEO Kenny MacAulay (25 years accountancy sector experience, ex-Royal Navy). Directors include Dave Jangid (founder of Debitam, Capium) and Mohit Baheti (co-founder of tech startups, 15 years in finance/taxation). Integrates with Companies House and HMRC APIs. Features include AML checks, e-signature, payroll, SA100/CT600 filing, MTD for VAT. Phone: 020 3835 6040. Sister businesses: Debitam. WordPress site.

one_liner.value: UK fintech reinventing the business overdraft with the Flexible Trade Account, providing intelligent real-time working capital for SMEs

pricing.value: Flexible Trade Account - advance up to 90% of revenue, no personal guarantees required. Transparent pricing and flexible repayment options. No fixed fees.

headquarter_location.value: London, United Kingdom (Borough Yards, 13 Dirty Lane, London, SE1 9PA)

target_customer.value: UK SMEs needing working capital; also banks, alternative lenders, and platforms as distribution partners

press_releases.value: Bourn secures £3.5 million (Dec 2025), Bourn Closes £1.5M Seed Funding (Feb 2025), Bourn Partners with Honey Badger (Jul 2025)

notes: Founded May 2024 by Nick Tracey (CEO), Roger Vincent (CGO), Paul Gambrell (CTO). FCA Authorised for e-money license (Jul 2025). First bank partner: Investec (Jun 2025). First live customers Aug 2025. Raised £1.5M pre-seed (Feb 2025) and £3.5M Seed (Oct 2025). Flexible Trade Account connects to company bank and accounting systems, uses real-time data to unlock credit against outstanding invoices. Built-in KYC/KYB, sanctions screening, AI contract analysis. Also offers B2B platform for banks/lenders (embedded finance, white-label solutions). Customer testimonial from Gloucester Road Maintenance.

one_liner.value: AI-powered collaborative staff bank connecting NHS Trusts directly with compliance-ready healthcare professionals, eliminating agency fees

pricing.value: Zero fees for NHS Trusts - now and forever. No agency margins, no permanent placement fees, no hidden costs. Practices pay clinician rates only.

target_customer.value: NHS Trusts, hospitals, healthcare settings, primary care teams

notes: Owned by HealsGood, a global healthcare innovation company. Sister platform to Careo. Founded by Jack Henderson (started as medical recruiter, built one of UK's largest clinical insourcing companies). Offers locum, short-term cover, and permanent staff recruitment. AI-powered shift matching uses real-time availability and location data. Handles background checks, registration validation, work authorisation, ongoing compliance tracking. Also has US presence (flexzo.ai/us). Has investor relations page and carbon reduction plan.
